DOC.detailed_description: The overall goal project improve health quality life person live HIV/AIDS ( PLWH ) . To end , implement innovative model enhance early integrative palliative care service ( EPC ) person diagnose AIDS . Patients recruit either inpatient service outpatient infectious disease program ( IDP ) Grady Health System ( GHS ) Atlanta , Georgia . The AIDS EPC Package include use motivational interviewing ( MI ) facilitate adjustment disease advance care plan decision making . The project three specific aim : Aim 1 . Conduct research clinical trial ( RCT ) examine efficacy AIDS EPC Package intervention vs. standard HIV care ( SOC ) compare outcome 12 month post baseline . Our hypothesis AIDS EPC group : . Better clinical outcome : low one year mortality , high proportion initiate antiretroviral therapy ( ART ) , high proportion virologic suppression , high CD4 gain , few opportunistic infection ( OI ) , few hospitalization , low depression score , good symptom management ( include cognitive dysfunction ) . ii . Better psychosocial outcome : Better cop skill , high perceive social support , high spirituality , high level self-advocacy , low proportion report substance use . iii . Better Quality Life ( QOL ) high proportion report advance care plan activity : name surrogate ; set personal goal regard life save measure ; discuss goal surrogate . SECONDARY OUTCOMES : Aim 2 . Evaluate cost effectiveness cost utility AIDS EPC Package compare SOC outcome value survival quality-adjusted life year ( QALYs ) respectively . Aim 3 . Promote engagement retention HIV care evidence attend great proportion schedule appointment report high satisfaction care compare SOC .
